about_the_game:
**************** Announcements ***************
We've identified the issue causing creating the split screen during the hallucinations and have pushed a hotfix.
Monitoring now to see if there are any further issues.
Sorry for any inconvenience and thank you for letting us know about the problem!
**********************************************

Visiting your sexual therapist was supposed to be just a quick in-and-out. However, maybe because of the stress of the last year, things don't go as planned. Hard to say what is even real anymore.

The game features:
* a VR POV experience
* a professional voice-over from a real world dominatrix
* controls to fight the urge to give in to her practices
* luscious 3d modeling and textures
* body physics
* soundtrack

*Notice*
This is one of our older scenes, but has remained a fan favorite so we're glad to announce we're bringing it to steam!

content_descriptors.notes: This game lets you take control of someone who is having a hard time telling reality apart from fantasy in a very sexual setting.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC

short_description: Take control of the character in this one and attempt to resist giving into the practices of the sensual doctor dominatrix. Fight your urges by hitting the triggers on your controllers when prompted (or don't!)
